channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Last Chapter
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (C. C. Andrews)
item.description:
Miss Bosanquet needed help with the last chapter of her book; but it came from an most unexpected source.

And when an old love appeared, his presence threatened more than her peaceful writing time!
